T02TD3578E:213a-1: kalpokta ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
T02TD3578E:213a-3: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3578E:213a-4: 'phags ma ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3578E:213a-5: dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas 'ga' zhig tu stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02TD3578E:213b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma'i ras bris la sogs pa bkram ste phyi'i mchod pas mchod nas rang gi snying gar @213b dri ma med ma'i zla ba yongs su gang ba'i 'od la dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i sems kyi zla ba rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02TD3578E:213b-1: de'i sa bon dgod par bya ste /
T02TD3578E:213b-2: dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa ni //
T02TD3578E:213b-3: me yi yi ge'i steng du gnas //
T02TD3578E:213b-4: a'i yig dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02TD3578E:213b-5: nam mkha' gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD3578E:213b-6: de yi sems kyi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD3578E:213b-7: 'gro ba rnams ni dri med byas //
T02TD3578E:213b-8: lhan cig la sogs khams rnams sbyangs //
T02TD3578E:213b-9: ku ru kulle'i ri bor song //
T02TD3578E:213b-10: yang dag bskul ba de yis ni //
T02TD3578E:213b-12: de la sa bon mchod chen gyi //
T02TD3578E:213b-13: mkhas pas sprin tshogs spro bar bya //
T02TD3578E:213b-14: me tog bdug pa de bzhin du //
T02TD3578E:213b-15: mar me dri dang zhal zas tshogs //
T02TD3578E:213b-16: sgeg mo phreng ma glu ma gar //
T02TD3578E:213b-17: de bzhin rol mo sogs kyis mchod //
T02TD3578E:213b-18: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02TD3578E:213b-19: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD3578E:213b-20: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02TD3578E:213b-21: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD3578E:213b-22: 'di yi sngags ni rnam gsum brjod //
T02TD3578E:213b-23: de nas bzod par gsol bar bya //
T02TD3578E:213b-24: de la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis //
T02TD3578E:213b-25: gang yang bdag blo rmongs pa yis //
T02TD3578E:213b-26: nyes byas cung zad gang bgyis pa //
T02TD3578E:213b-27: lus can kun gyi skyabs yin phyir //
T02TD3578E:213b-28: lha mo khyod kyis bzod par mdzod //
T02TD3578E:213b-29: byams pa'i sems la gnas pa ni //
T02TD3578E:213b-30: slar yang de la nges par bcing //
T02TD3578E:213b-31: snying rje'i sems ni yang dag bskyed //
T02TD3578E:213b-32: rab tu dga' ba'i sems 'bab bya //
T02TD3578E:213b-33: phyi nas btang snyoms bya ba ste //
T02TD3578E:213b-34: kun nas sems tsam rnam par bzhag / sems ni stong pa nyid bya ste //
T02TD3578E:213b-35: rang gzhan rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD3578E:213b-36: stong nyid me yis bsregs byas nas //
T02TD3578E:213b-37: phung lnga slar yang srid mi 'byung //
T02TD3578E:213b-38: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra svabh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD3578E:213b-39: skad cig stong nyid sbyar byas nas //
T02TD3578E:213b-40: sems nyid kyi ni ngal gso bya //
T02TD3578E:213b-41: sngon gyi dam bcas dran byas la //
T02TD3578E:213b-42: sa bon tsam zhig slar yang bsam //
T02TD3578E:213b-43: gcig pu yongs su myang 'das na //
T02TD3578E:213b-44: bdag gis sems can bslus 'gyur la //
T02TD3578E:213b-45: srid pa'i rgya mtsho gting med las //
T02TD3578E:213b-46: de la ji ltar bdag gis gdon //
T02TD3578E:213b-47: zhes pa'i 'dod pas snying rjer bya //
T02TD3578E:213b-48: sems nyid stong nyid spang byas la //
T02TD3578E:213b-49: kun gyi khams kyi rang bzhin du //
T02TD3578E:214a-2: sangs rgyas byin rlabs nam mkhar ni //
T02TD3578E:214a-3: sa bon autbal de gyur las //
T02TD3578E:214a-4: autpa la ni zla ba'i gzugs //
T02TD3578E:214a-5: aa yig dbyangs las yang dag byung //
T02TD3578E:214a-6: zla bde las sngar sa bon //
T02TD3578E:214a-7: de las 'od zer byung gyur pa //
T02TD3578E:214a-8: de yi rnam par sbyangs gyur par //
T02TD3578E:214a-9: 'jig rten khams rnams ma lus bsam //
T02TD3578E:214a-10: kun nas sbyangs par rtogs de yi //
T02TD3578E:214a-11: 'od kyis sangs rgyas bye ba rnams //
T02TD3578E:214a-12: zhugs gyur de las autpa la bsam //
T02TD3578E:214a-13: de yis sgrol mar gyur byas te //
T02TD3578E:214a-14: sku mdog dmar po phyag bzhi ma //
T02TD3578E:214a-15: padma dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD3578E:214a-16: skal bzang gos zung dmar pos brgyan //
T02TD3578E:214a-17: rna rgyan dmar po dbu rgyan bcas //
T02TD3578E:214a-18: phyag g-yas mi 'jigs pa dang ni //
T02TD3578E:214a-19: gzhan yang mda' ni bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3578E:214a-20: g-yon na gzhu dang gnyis pa na //
T02TD3578E:214a-21: autpal dmar po bsnams pa ni //
T02TD3578E:214a-22: ku ru kulle'i phug son pa //
T02TD3578E:214a-23: a'a ro li ka'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD3578E:214a-24: sgra gcan steng du 'dod lha yi //
T02TD3578E:214a-25: chung mar bcas pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD3578E:214a-26: sgyu rtsal kun dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD3578E:214a-27: de la rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas //
T02TD3578E:214a-28: yang dag rgyan rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02TD3578E:214a-29: bcom ldan 'das ma bsgom par bya //
T02TD3578E:214a-30: dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs pa la //
T02TD3578E:214a-31: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drang bya //
T02TD3578E:214a-32: skad cig rnam pas yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02TD3578E:214a-33: ye shes 'khor lo mdun bzhugs la //
T02TD3578E:214a-35: dgug gzhug bcing dang mnyes par bya //
T02TD3578E:214a-36: dam tshig phyag rgya rab sbyor bas //
T02TD3578E:214a-37: zhal gyi lam nas gzhug bya ste //
T02TD3578E:214a-38: lag gnyis thal mo rab sbyar te //
T02TD3578E:214a-39: gang tshe legs sbyar smad bya ste //
T02TD3578E:214a-40: 'di dag rtse mor bya ba ste //
T02TD3578E:214a-41: dbus su ming med bya ba la //
T02TD3578E:214a-43: mtheb chen gnyis po 'og tu son //
T02TD3578E:214a-44: dam tshig 'di ni bcing byas nas //
T02TD3578E:214a-46: de nas dbang bskur zhu bya ste //
T02TD3578E:214a-47: sangs rgyas zhes bya'i tshigs bcad brjod //
T02TD3578E:214a-48: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02TD3578E:214a-49: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba ltar //
T02TD3578E:214a-50: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD3578E:214a-51: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD3578E:214a-52: cher gyur de rnams kyis sbyin byed //
T02TD3578E:214a-53: rgyal srid dbang bskur ming las ni //
T02TD3578E:214a-54: me tog dbang dang rdo rjes gnang //
T02TD3578E:214a-55: spyan ma la sogs lnga rnams kyis //
T02TD3578E:214a-56: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02TD3578E:214b-0: khams gsum kun gyis @214b phyag byas pa //
T02TD3578E:214b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02TD3578E:214b-2: gnas las byung ba sbyin par byed //
T02TD3578E:214b-3: sangs rgyas dbang bskur sgrol ma yi //
T02TD3578E:214b-4: chos kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur //
T02TD3578E:214b-5: 'od zer dmar po rnams kyis ni //
T02TD3578E:214b-6: 'gro ba gsum po snang byed cing //
T02TD3578E:214b-7: rin chen dbang bskur thob gyur nas //
T02TD3578E:214b-8: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02TD3578E:214b-9: de ring sngon gsungs cho ga yis //
T02TD3578E:214b-10: lo phyed brtan par zhugs pa yi //
T02TD3578E:214b-11: bsgom pa'i rim pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD3578E:214b-12: thun mtshams gsum du gtor ma dbul //
T02TD3578E:214b-13: sgrol ma'i snying po 'di yis ni //
T02TD3578E:214b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD3578E:214b-17: de nas sngon bsnyen yi ge 'bum //
T02TD3578E:214b-18: bzlas nas las ni brtsam par bya //
T02TD3578E:214b-19: cha shas kyis ni shes rab 'phel //
T02TD3578E:214b-20: cha shas gzhan gyis dbang du byed //
T02TD3578E:214b-21: de bzhin cha shas gsum pa yis //
T02TD3578E:214b-22: mi yi dug ni 'gugs par byed //
T02TD3578E:214b-24: bud med sgeg ma myos pas kyang //
T02TD3578E:214b-25: goms sbyor lha yi bu mo mdzes //
T02TD3578E:214b-27: hr'i:yig myos byed 'dab ma la bkod bud med rnams kyi lce 'dzag byed //
T02TD3578E:214b-28: de ngag nyid kyang blo yis skye bo'i snying gi dbus su 'ga' zhig tu //
T02TD3578E:214b-29: mche rnams kyi sngon bsgoms dug 'joms chos kyi yi ge rang nyid 'bab //
T02TD3578E:214b-30: sgrol ma'i snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal shes bya brtse ba'i gnas //
T02TD3578E:214b-31: rang nyid sgrol ma las skyes pa'i //
T02TD3578E:214b-32: ku ru kuller bsgom par bya //
T02TD3578E:214b-33: bsgrub bya de yi kha nang son //
T02TD3578E:214b-34: 'dod pas myos par bsam par bya //
T02TD3578E:214b-35: ye shes sems dpa'i chu skyes las //
T02TD3578E:214b-36: spyi bor bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab bsam //
T02TD3578E:214b-37: brtul zhugs can gyis thun gsum bsgoms //
T02TD3578E:214b-38: nyi ma bdun gyis ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD3578E:214b-39: rim pa goms pas dngos grub phran //
T02TD3578E:214b-40: mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD3578E:214b-41: 'dir ni dpal dang bcas gyur pa'i //
T02TD3578E:214b-42: dngos grub chen po nyid kyang 'grub //
T02TD3578E:214b-43: rtog pa las gsungs pa'i ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
